content:
Hello! I can't seem to reach https://ping.rust-lang.org/. Is it still a thing? It's linked to from https://www.rust-lang.org as Check Website Status.
Also, not sure if this is the right place to ask, but can I ask for a deploy of the website? https://www.rust-lang.org/learn has an "Unknown localization translated-nomicon-button" bug that is already fixed on https://www-staging.rust-lang.org/learn

I think to deploy, you can post a PR that merges everything from master to the deploy branch. https://github.com/rust-lang/www.rust-lang.org/pull/1611 is an example.

I have no idea about ping, looks like #1619 is open about that.
@Pietro Albini I think this was hooked up to the ping service you were migrating recently? Did we miss a (re)configuration of dns?
yeah, that was for the apex ping status page
tbh we should just remove that link, it's not that useful
